name: StaFi Staked MATIC
description: What is the project about? rMATIC, a decentralized DeFi product produced by StaFi that solves the liquidity problem of staked MATIC on Ethereum mainnet. What makes your project unique? rMATIC product can help MATIC stakers solve two major issues: - There will be no need to wait for 80 checkpoints（around 9 days) to withdraw the staked MATIC. Users can transfer and trade rMATIC tokens at any time to liberate liquidity and hedge price risks. - There is no need to learn the complicated PoS consensus (based on Tendermint) mechanism or staking reward calculation rules if you want to maximize staking rewards. With the rMATIC product, users only follow a few steps to deposit MATIC into the rMATIC contract, which will automatically select the best validator for delegation by the profit maximization strategy. History of your project. StaFi has launched rETH, rMATIC, rSOL, rATOM, rBNB and so on to solves the liquidity problem. What’s next for your project? rMATIC list on more DEX and CEX, including swap pool and lending pool What can your token be used for? rMATIC can be swapped for MATIC in a DEX.
